resources.string: I used to be down, no cash flow in sight, Hustled every day, just to make things right, Dreaming \'bout the life, the one I never had, Big house, fancy cars, feeling kind of sad, But now I\'m living like a king, pockets always full, Money\'s coming in, nothing to worry \'bout at all, Rolling in the dough, no more counting pennies, I used to be a broke man, but now I\'m living like a wealthy, I put in the work, now I\'m reaping the rewards, Got a mansion on the hill, and a garage full of cars, Champagne popping, every night\'s a celebration, Used to have no money, now I\'m living in elation, But now I\'m living like a king, pockets always. full, Money\'s coming in, nothing to worry \'bout at all, Rolling in the dough, no more counting pennies, I used to be a broke man,
